evidence.claim: Blossom Home Care utilizes AWS services for data storage and processing.
The company integrates with EHRs using HL7 and FHIR standards.
Blossom Home Care employs X12 transaction sets for claims processing and eligibility checks.
They utilize Amazon S3 for secure data storage in compliance with HIPAA regulations.
The integration patterns include RESTful APIs for real-time data access.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in health tech and uses X12 for claims processing and eligibility.
